name: search-composer-packagist
title: Search Composer Packagist
description: Search Composer Packagist For PHP Packages
author: danyelkeddah

commands.name: composer
commands.title: Search Packages
commands.subtitle: Composer Packagist
commands.description: Searches Composer Packagist for PHP Packages

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
